workflows_metadata.title: HR Agent - Offer Letter Generator
workflows_metadata.description: Generates and sends personalized offer letters to selected candidates. Automates document creation, email dispatch, and logs confirmations in Google Sheets.

workflows_metadata.title: HR Agent - On & Off Boarding
workflows_metadata.description: Automates onboarding and offboarding workflows for employees. Manages account provisioning, checklist completion, notifications, and logs status updates.

workflows_metadata.title: HR Agent - Performance Review Management
workflows_metadata.description: Handles scheduling, reminders, and status tracking for employee performance reviews. Sends reminders, collects feedback, and logs completion details.

workflows_metadata.title: IT Agent - GitHub Access Invite
workflows_metadata.description: Automates inviting team members to GitHub repositories. Handles permission assignment and logs the invite status in Google Sheets.

workflows_metadata.title: IT Agent - GitHub Push & Update Files
workflows_metadata.description: Manages automated push and file update workflows for GitHub repositories. Verifies file changes, pushes commits, and logs activity to Google Sheets.

workflows_metadata.title: Marketing Agent - Content Publishing
workflows_metadata.description: Automates the generation and publishing of tailored social media posts (Twitter, Telegram, Reddit) based on content from Google Sheets. Filters content by upload date and priority, generates posts using LLM, and publishes them with Slack notifications.

workflows_metadata.title: Marketing Agent - Digital Marketing & SEO Analysis
workflows_metadata.description: Performs a comprehensive SEO and digital marketing analysis of a given website URL. Extracts meta tags, headings, images, schema markup, and generates a structured executive summary and detailed report with improvement recommendations. Results are logged to Google Sheets, emailed, and announced via Slack.
